meanings.definition: A person or company that brings goods or services into a country for sale.
meanings.sent1: The importer brought in a shipment of toys from overseas.
meanings.sent2: The importer is responsible for ensuring the products meet customs regulations.
meanings.sent3: The importer accidentally ordered a container full of rubber ducks instead of electronics.
meanings.sent4: She was an importer of exotic spices, adding flavor to the local market.
meanings.sent5: The importer's warehouse was filled with treasures from around the world.

meanings.definition: A person or company that brings in or introduces something new or different.
meanings.sent1: As an importer of ideas, he always sought innovative solutions.
meanings.sent2: The importer of technology showcased the latest gadgets at the expo.
meanings.sent3: The importer of jokes had everyone laughing at the party.
meanings.sent4: She was an importer of creativity, sparking inspiration in her team.
meanings.sent5: The importer of trends was always ahead of the fashion curve.
